Package testproject

Class Player

java.lang.Object
testproject.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class contains the player's name, gold, team and inventory. It is also responsible for making the player or enemy's move before delegating to a specific monster if attack is chosen.

    • checkIfActiveMonster

      public boolean checkIfActiveMonster()
      A function to check whether the team can still fight and set the active monster variable if the prievious active monster fainted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there is at least one monster in the team still able to fight.

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(Monster enemy)
      Takes player input to choose which move to make out of attack, use item, switch monster and flee.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy monster the current move is against.

    • makeRandomMove

      public void makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
      Same as makeMove, but randomly chooses an option instead of taking player input.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy monster.

    • refreshTeam

      public void refreshTeam()
